amendment.description: Amendment prohibits the use of funds to prepare, propose, or promulgate any regulation or guidance related to the social cost of carbon.
amendment.purpose: An amendment to prohibit the use of funds to prepare, propose, or promulgate any regulation or guidance related to the social cost of Carbon.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Gosar amendment (A036) Agreed to by recorded vote: 230 - 188 (Roll no. 256).

action.text: House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Gosar amendment (A036) Agreed to by recorded vote: 230 - 188 (Roll no. 256).

Amendment agreed to Committee of the Whole
